itunes:title: Ezekiel Part 1 • Dr. Jan J. Martin • Oct. 24 - 30
title: Ezekiel Part 1 • Dr. Jan J. Martin • Oct. 24 - 30
description:
How does Ezekiel teach about the nature of God? Dr. Jan Martin explores themes of mercy, repentance, and mercy while she examines Ezekiel’s message to the Israelites.

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
